title: Katie Price claims she DID spend night in Simon Cowell's bed and she 'liked his hairy chest'
text:

Amid rumours of a secret liaison with Simon Cowell , Katie Price has reportedly admitted she DID spend the night in the music mogul's bed. 
The model claims she went back to the X Factor supremo's mansion after an awards bash and ended up staying the night. 
Cowell strongly denies hooking up with the TV star after her ex-fiancé Leandro Penna claimed it broke up their relationship. 
And mum-of-five Katie insists the pair did not have sex - but told The Sun on Sunday they 'undressed, got into bed and had fun'. 
She told the newspaper: "We kissed and I ran my fingers through his chest hair thinking, ‘This is the first time I’ve been in bed with a proper man’." Read More Katie Price challenges vile trolls to apologise “in person” to Harvey over sick abuse Katie and Simon have been friends for years - but insist they have never had sex (Photo: WireImage) 
Last week, Penna claimed he grew suspicious when a boozy Katie turned up at home in the morning after a "business meeting" with Cowell. 
He said Katie denied the pair had sex but then claims he found evidence in the form of text messages between the pair. 
A source close to Cowell strongly denied the pair had sex - which Katie also maintains. 
"He's been friends with Katie for years, but this is nonsense," the source said. 
Katie added: "We had fun but we did not have sex." 
Penna, 31, claimed he ended his relationship with Katie because of her "lies" about the alleged fling. 
He told The Sun: "It’s the reason I split up with her." Read More Katie Price's teenage troll ARRESTED after allegedly mocking her son Harvey on Twitter Cowell is happily settled down with Lauren Silverman, mother of his son Eric (Photo: Getty) 
Cowell, 57, and girlfriend Lauren Silverman have a son Eric, who turns three this month, and have been together for several years. 
Cowell was nominated for three gongs at the National Television Awards but snubbed the ceremony after missing out in all categories. Read More
